Package com.knowgate.crm

Customer Relationships and Distribution Lists Management This package contains objects for representing Cient Companies, Individual Customers, Sales Opotunities Pipeline and e-mail Distribution Lists.

See: Description

Package com.knowgate.crm Description

Customer Relationships and Distribution Lists Management

This package contains objects for representing Cient Companies, Individual Customers, Sales Opotunities Pipeline and e-mail Distribution Lists.
